content: Ask for help. Your social worker can teach you to cope with these feelings better. Maintain a Healthy Weight Maintaining the Body Mass Index (BMI) between 18.5 and 24.9 is considered healthy, but it’s essential to consult a doctor to determine the best weight for an individual’s overall health.
